#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

bool b[1000005];
int ans;
void func(int a[], int idx, int sum, int n)
{
   // cout << "sum = " << sum << " " << "idx = " << idx << endl; 
    if ( sum >= 0 && idx != 1 ) {
         if ( b[sum] == false ) {
              ans++;
              b[sum] = true;
         }
    }
    if ( idx == n+1 ) return;
    func(a,idx+1,sum+a[idx],n);
    func(a,idx+1,sum-a[idx],n);
    func(a,idx+1,sum,n);
}

int main()
{
    int t,n,i,a[10002];
    for ( ;; ) {
        scanf("%d", &t);
        if ( t == 0 ) break;
        scanf("%d", &n);
        memset(b, false, sizeof(b));
        ans = 0;
        for ( i = 1; i <= n; i++ ) scanf("%d", &a[i]);
        func(a,1,0,n);
        printf("%d %d\n", t, ans-1);
    }
    return 0;
}
